body.title: Checks
body.elms:
✓   \u2713 check
    ✕   \u2715
    ✗   \u2717 x mark
    ✘   \u2718 x mark bold
    ❏   \u274f checkbox
    ×   times

    ▶

    ⬅   \u2b05

    ⌘ – ⌘ – ⌘ – Command Key
    ⌥ – ⌥ – ⌥ – Option Key
    ⇧ – ⇧ – ⇧ – Shift Key
    ⎋ – ⎋ – ⎋ – ESC Key
    ⇪ – ⇪ – ⇪ – Capslock
    ⏎ – ⏎ – ⏎ – Return
    ⌫ – ⌫ – ⌫ – Delete / Backspace
